src_original: (436) bha ||  namo buddhāya ||
namo dharmmāya ||
namaḥ saṁghāya ||
namaḥ saptānāṁ samyakkaṁ boddhakoṭinām ||
nasoloke'rhatānāṁ |
namaḥ śrotāpannānāṁ ||  namaḥ sakṛtāgāmināṁ |  namo losamyagnatānaṁ ||
namaḥ samyaka pratipannānāṁ ||
namah devadapāṇāṁ ||  sāpānugraha samarthānāṁ ||  namaḥ siddhaviyādharāṇāṁ ||
namo devaṛṣiṇāṁ ||  namo devavraktāya ||  namo idrāya ||  namo rudrāya ||  namo umā patisahitāya ||
namo bhagavate nārāyanāya ||  pañcasu namaskatāya ||  namo bhagavate mahākārāya ||
tripuranagara vidrāpanakarāya ||  adhimuktismaśānavāsiniya ||  namo mātṛgaṇa namaskṛtāya ||
namo bhagavate tathāgata kulasya ||
namo bhagavate (437)  padmakulasya ||
namo bhagavate vajakūlasya ||  namo bhagavateratnakulasya ||  namo bhagavate maṇikūlasya ||  namo bhagavate rājakūlasya ||
namo bhagavate kumārakulasya ||

namo bhagavate harasudarśana praharaṇa rājāyatathāgatāgyārhate samyakkaṁ buddhāya ||  namo bhagavate amitā bhāgyatathāgatā yārhate samyakkaṁ buddhāya ||  namo bhagavate akṣotyāya tathāgatā yārhate samyakkaṁ buddhāya ||
namo bhagavate paryyaguruve dūryya pravojhajāyatathāgatā yārhate samyakka buddhāya ||  namo bhagavate sūpūṣpita śorendararājāyata thāgatā yārhate samyakkaṁ buddhāya ||
namo bhagavate ratnake jarājāyatathā gatā yārhate samyakkaṁ buddhāya ||  namo bhagavate verocanāyatathāgatā yārhata samyakkaṁ buddhāya ||

śitanayanotparagandha ketarājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyakkaṁ buddhāya ||  namo bhagavate śākya mūnaye tathāgatā yārhate samyakkaṁ buddhāya ||  etyaḥ namaskṛtvā iyaṁ bhagavantaṁ ssarvatathāgato ṣaśītāta patrānāmāpara |
jitā prabhaṁgirā sarvaka rikalaṁha vivādo prasamaṇīsarvagraha nivāriṇī paravindhācchedanī sarvākāle mṛtyū nivāriṇī sarvabandhana mokṣaṇī ||
sarva dṛṣṭasatva nivāraṇī sarva ligaḍabha jeṇalī sarvayakṣarākṣasa grahāṇāṁ viśvaṁsanakarī |
aṣṭāviṁśatīnakṣatrāṇāṁ praśādanakarī |
aṣṭānāṁ mahāgrahānāṁ viśvaśanakarī |  sarvaśakrūnivāraṇī dyola dūṣṣaśaḥ svapnavināsanī |
